import useSWR from "swr"; import formatRelative from "date-fns/formatRelative"; import differenceInMinutes from "date-fns/differenceInMinutes"; import Layout from "../pages/Components/Layout"; import gql from "graphql-tag"; import { hasuraUserClient } from "../lib/hasura-user-client"; import { useMutation } from "@apollo/react-hooks"; const today = new Date(); const GetUsers = gql` query MyQuery { User { id Name email } } `; export const getStaticProps = async () => { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const initialData = await hasura.request(GetUsers); return { props: { initialData, }, revalidate: 1, }; }; export default function MembersPage({ initialData }) { const REMOVE_TODO = gql` mutation delete_User($id: Int!) { delete_User(where: { id: { _eq: $id } }) { affected_rows } } `; const [removeTodoMutation] = useMutation(REMOVE_TODO); const removeTodo = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); e.stopPropagation(); removeTodoMutation({ variables: { id: User.id }, optimisticResponse: true, update: (cache) => { const existingTodos = cache.readQuery({ query: GetUsers }); const newTodos = existingTodos.todos.filter((t) => t.id !== User.id); cache.writeQuery({ query: GetUsers, data: { User: newTodos }, }); }, }); }; const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { data } = useSWR(GetUsers, (query) => hasura.request(query), { initialData, revalidateOnMount: true, }); return (
